chunk:
NENA Mineral Eye Cream

Brand: NENA

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Sea Silt Extract/Extrait de limon marin, Aqua, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Propanediol, Undecane, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Olivate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Punica Granatum Ex

, Punica Granatum Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lactobacillus Ferment, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Arctostaphylos Uva-Ursi Leaf Extract, Caffeine, Tridecane, Sorbitan Olivate, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Xanthan Gum, Levulinic Acid, p-Anisic Ac

ic Acid, p-Anisic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Levulinate

Directions: Apply 1 or 2 times a day, gently massage a small amount of eye cream under the eye and around crow's feet until thoroughly absorbed.

Warnings: For all skin types. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes, if contact occurs, immediately flush with water.
